title: caspian5
author: caspian5
content: I have over 70k worth of gift cards to this store: https://www.directtoolsoutlet.com/These giftcards will only work in stores. I am selling them for 30% and more discount for bulk orders over 1k.( I have denoms of $10 - $200 available. )Store Locations:Alabama, California, Colorado, Delaware, Florida, Georgia, Kentucky, Michigan, Missouri, North Carolina, Ohio, Oklahoma, Pennsylvania, Ohio, Oklahoma, Texas, Virginia, Wisconsin and more Coming soon.I will be giving away 3 free "vouch copies" for anyone willing to purchase some items and send me proof pictures.The gift card balance can only be check in stores, or after you make a purchase it will show on the receipt.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------I also have over 10k worth of Patxi's Pizza's giftcards. I am also selling for 30% or discount for more bulk purchases. These will only work in stores.https://patxispizza.com/Locations: Colorado, San Francisco, South Bay, East Bay, Southern California, and Seattle.I will be giving away 3 free "vouch copies" for anyone willing to purchase some food and send me proof pictures. The gift card balance can be checked online using this website:https://www3.myicard.net/it will show something like this:https://prnt.sc/9QS-GSW-TjQa---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Anyone interested in purchasing I am open to having an admin or a regular do escrow but you have to pay their fee.I accept BTC or Cashapp for repeat buyers.You can contact me here anytime or on Telegram if you have any questions. @Ninety99mhttps://999m.sellix.io/Instructions are for customers or anyone interested in my vouch copies.
